favproducts.name: Delightful Cocoa Bombs
favproducts.description: Simply drop the Cocoa Bomb into a glass of hot milk and watch in amazement as the delightful cocoa bomb transforms your hot glass of milk into an extremely decadent glass of hot cocoa.

favproducts.name: Gingerbread Man Cake
favproducts.description: Take a look at this delightfully aesthetic cake. This is the perfect product to chow down on during the holidays!

favproducts.name: Pink Velvet Flamingo Cake
favproducts.description: The perfect cake to start the Summer. With pineapple and vanilla flavoring, this just might be the perfect surprise for any delightful Summer day!

favproducts.name: Easter Bunny Cake
favproducts.description: The perfect traditional Easter snack. Our delightful Easter Bunny Cake has any Easter occasion covered.
